ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cut into cubes
1 (8 ounce) can diced italian-style tomatoes, drained
1 (11 ounce) can Mexican-style corn with red and green peppers, drained
1 (10 ounce) can white shoepeg corn, drained

cookingTips: Melt cream cheese and butter together gently over low heat to create a smooth sauce
Drain all canned vegetables thoroughly to prevent excess moisture in the casserole
Stir in half the cheese and reserve the rest for topping to ensure both creamy interior and crispy top
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how to combine cream cheese and butter into a smooth sauce and balance multiple corn components.
